newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING - J.D. Edwards & Co.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING - J.D. Edwards & Co.

text.p: J.D. Edwards & Co filed Thursday with the Securities and Exchange Commission for an initial public offering to sell common stock that would raise up $300 million.
The offering will be made through Morgan Stanley Dean Witter, Deutsche Morgan Grenfall and Robertson, Stephens & Co.
Net proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including working capital.

The company has applied to Nasdaq to trade under the stock symbol JDEC.O. The company did not provide details as to how much stock would be offered, total outstanding after the offering or estimated price per share.
Edwards, based in Denver, Col., develops, markets and supports Enterprise Resource Planning software that operates on multiple computing platforms.
